name: v2.5.0
body:
## What's Changed

### Application Performance Monitoring (APM)
* feat(contrib/sarama): option to add custom consumer/producer span tags by @fabiomargarido in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3993
* fix(net/http): fix segfault on nil response by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4099
* fix(contrib/gorm.io): allow resource name to be overridden by custom tags by @will-bem in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3909
* feat(contrib/gin-gonic/gin): add WithStatusCheck and WithUseGinErrors options by @theo303 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3984
* feat(contrib/mcp-go): Initial `mcp-go` tracer implementation by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4100
* feat(contrib/mcp-go): Trace MCP session initializations with MLObs spans by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4101
* feat(contrib/mcp-go): Record MCP Session ID as tag by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4106
* feat: add request id headers to aws lambda start/end invocation calls by @ojproductions in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4136
* fix(contrib/net/http): when Wrapping use the WrappedHandler by @jacobmikesell in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4079
* fix(haproxy): data race on span TTL eviction by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4156
* feat(contrib/mcp-go): Simplified way to add tracing by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4122
* fix(contrib): enhance appsec tests with WAF timeout adjustments to GraphQL contribs by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4160
* fix: database/sql tags not propagated from registers by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4157
* fix(contrib/gorilla/mux): nil pointer exception in Orchestrion with Subrouter by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4110
* fix(contrib/mcp-go): Report structured tool call errors as error spans by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4158
* fix(haproxy): data race on span TTL eviction 2 by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4163
* fix(gateway-api): correctly finish request-mirror span + fix missing query params by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4167
* feat(contrib/valyala/fasthttp): add orchestrion support by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4162
* feat(contrib/mcp-go): Intent capture by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4123
* feat(contrib/go-sdk): Initial `go-sdk` tracer implementation by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4199
* fix(contrib/haproxy): don't warn on each cache deletion by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4229
* feat(profiler): switch back to zstd compression by default by @nsrip-dd in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4080
* chore(internal/version): bump release tag to v2.5.0-dev by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4081
* feat: v1 trace protocol implementation by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3947
* fix(sampling): Force manual sampling on locked traces by @genesor in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4084
* chore: small improvements to v1 protocol by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4090
* chore: revert breaking error tracking changes by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4095
* fix(ddtrace/tracer): TestTracerTwiceStartRuntimeMetrics by @felixge in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4086
* fix: ETP wasn't checking for v1 endpoint in agent by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4112
* fix(contrib/confluentinc/confluent-kafka-go/kafka.v2): ensure kafka.produce span is always finished  by @pedroreys in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4107
* fix: Fix duplicate and out-of-order key in supported_configurations by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4121
* test(telemetry): atomic in tests by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4120
* chore(99designs/gqlgen): output more information on test failure by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4131
* fix(internal/remoteconfig): allow Remote Config singleton to be reentrant by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4118
* feat: store OTEL process context in named anonymous mapping on Linux by @nsavoire in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3937
* fix(ddtrace/tracer): ensure that sampling tests on remote config update are consistent by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4053
* fix: Use a real true value for headers by @ajgajg1134 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4161
* chore(stacktrace): Add parseSymbol benchmark by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4169
* fix(ddtrace/tracer): ensure determinism on metrics tests by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4168
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3967
* chore(stacktrace): Use internal/stacktrace package where it possible by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4062
* refactor(stacktrace): remove unnecessary locking from segmentPrefixTrie by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4154
* refactor(stacktrace): remove unused prefixTrie implementation by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4150
* perf(stacktrace): optimize parseSymbol with zero-allocation implementation by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4148
* fix(ddtrace/tracer): update abandoned spans' tests to use eventual assertions for log checks by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4170
* feat(internal/config): Introduce internal config package by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4064
* fix: avoid race condition in TestSamplingDecision by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4195
* refactor(internal/config): extract shared configProvider logic into generic get function by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4203
* fix: Change analytics env var from MCPGO to MCP by @jboolean in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4205
* refactor(config): add test config isolation and support debug programmatic API by @mtoffl01 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4204

### App & API Protection
* fix(appsec): add missing `_dd.appsec_request_downstream` span tag by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4130
* feat(instrumentation/appsec/emitter/waf): replace mapstructure/v2 by tailored code by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4181
* chore: fix a number of AppSec tests being silently skipped by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4141
* fix(appsec/waf): remove RASPScope on downward API10 addresses by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4140
* refactor(appsec): disable error scrubbing on WAF error codes by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4159
* feat(appsec): waf upgrade + security response id by @e-n-0 in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4113
* fix(appsec): `jsoniter` decoder treats trailing whitespace as invalid by @RomainMuller in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4179

### CI Visibility
* feat(civisibility): add `branch` parameter to test management tests API by @juan-fernandez in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4197
* feat(civisibility): add a test optimization mode where tracer only works on test optimization spans. by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4193
* fix(internal/civisibility): fixes an scenario where we might be deadlocking by waiting on a channel. by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4177
* feat(internal/civisibility): subtest-level test management & flaky retry support. by @tonyredondo in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4063

### Feature Flags
* feat(openfeature/provider): Add ability to pass context into openfeature provider to support cancellation by @leoromanovsky in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4087
* feat(openfeature): After Hook Exposure event writer by @eliottness in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4094

### LLM Observability
* chore(llmobs): skip tracing for the internal llmobs http transport when using Orchestrion by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4139
* fix(llmobs): add missing type aliases by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4200
* fix(llmobs): fix parentID field when starting a span from a propagated span by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4146
* fix(llmobs): fix llmobs to apm link for spans by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4104
* chore(llmobs): add telemetry to track llmobs usage by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4088

### General
* build(deps): bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.7.27 to 1.7.29 in /contrib/confluentinc/confluent-kafka-go/kafka.v2 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4105
* chore: update golang.org/x/crypto to v0.45.0 by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4145
* ci: enable codecov comments on PRs by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4207
* ci: Add cron jobs on 3 workflows by @cbeauchesne in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4202
* chore: Add CODEOWNERS to internal packages by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4171
* fix(gitlab): deny benchmark runs on temporary graphite branches by @faydef in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4164
* build(deps): bump the gh-actions-packages group across 3 directories with 10 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4073
* ci: set benchmarks to be interruptible outside main by @igoragoli in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4128
* chore(checks): Add Makefile checks by @kakkoyun in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4103
* chore(codeowners): add database monitoring team as code owner of the sql comment carrier by @na-ji in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4117
* fix(.gitlab): don't run benchmarks when tagging nested modules by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4119
* chore(ci): Use runner:apm-k8s-m8g-metal for microbenchmarking by @ddyurchenko in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4126
* chore(ci): adds id-token: write permission to ecossystem-label-issu workflow by @cbeauchesne in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4125
* fix(ci): fix gin smoke test issue by @rarguelloF in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4142
* fix(ci): Migrating Config Registry CI Jobs to Support V2 Format by @mhlidd in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4133
* chore(ci): work around smoke test breaking changes by @nsrip-dd in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4098
* fix: codeowner script doesn't change directories as needed by @hannahkm in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4108
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4212
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4175
* fix: module go.opentelemetry.io/collector/pdata@latest found (v1.46.0), but does not contain package go.opentelemetry.io/collector/pdata/internal/data/protogen/profiles/v1development by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4174
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4184
* fix: bump golang.org/x/crypto to v0.45.0 (Dependabot alert 408) by @darccio in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4186
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4196
* docs: update supported integrations documentation by @dd-octo-sts[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4206
* build(deps): bump the gh-actions-packages group across 2 directories with 6 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4192

## New Contributors
* @fabiomargarido made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3993
* @will-bem made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3909
* @theo303 made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3984
* @pedroreys made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4107
* @na-ji made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4117
* @jacobmikesell made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4079
* @nsavoire made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/3937
* @faydef made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4164
* @juan-fernandez made their first contribution in https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/pull/4197

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/DataDog/dd-trace-go/compare/v2.4.0...v2.5.0
